title: Convolutional Neural Networks
subtext: Analyzes grid-like data, such as images, using filters.
author: Buzzpy

description.title: Convolutional Neural Networks
texts: Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) are designed to process grid-like data, such as images. They use filters to detect patterns in different parts of an image, which helps in tasks like image classification.
CNNs are used for recognizing objects in photos or videos.
